title: Darkin Kayn drawing done by me in Ink
body:
Decided to draw an official Kayn in ink one for all the kayn mains. I chose Darkin since I personally love it. 

http://i68.tinypic.com/2r5dt80.jpg

If you want to support me search "Trueartstyles" on instagram.

replies.body: That's very well done!  I'd love to see this with some red touchups.  :O

> [{quoted}](name=Nanuk Pihoqahiak,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EAv58EWN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-02T09:50:08.959+0000)
>
> That's very well done!  I'd love to see this with some red touchups.  :O

Yeah that would be pretty cool, I just like to personally keep things simple.
That's fine too.  You have my mad respect for traditional artistic media.

> [{quoted}](name=Nanuk Pihoqahiak,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EAv58EWN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-02T10:36:33.847+0000)
>
> That's fine too.  You have my mad respect for traditional artistic media.

Thanks dude, I only do traditional because personally I find digital too pretentious.
Can I have this framed for my wall?

> [{quoted}](name=Skorpio,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EAv58EWN,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-02T17:20:59.547+0000)
>
> Can I have this framed for my wall?

Sure, for a small cost :P I cant draw for free bud, I take my work seriously, and if you ever want me to draw you something to have framed, i can always draw it for money. Thanks for the support though.
What's best way to reach you?

Boss walks over.
Boss, "Johnson what in tarnation are you-"
Stares down at drawing.
"Uhh I can exp-"
Boss, "Carry on."

God now I'm playing Rhaast's voice over in my head. Such a good character.

**THE REAPING WILL COMMENSE**
#_**NOW!**_
Very nice!!

I'll just stick to playing, lol.

Really well done though!
Scary!
Can you make GRIM REAPER Kayn now?

> [{quoted}](name=FeeNeeX,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EAv58EWN,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-03-03T04:06:01.678+0000)
>
> Can you make GRIM REAPER Kayn now?

yes i can
DO IT :)
Maybe try drawing a concept for Candy Kayn.
how send picture help me idk

What do you mean bro?

Rhaast*
